sentences.en: As soon as I arrived I knew the hunch was right.
sentences.cn: 我一到就知道我们猜想得不错.

sentences.en: Did she have a hunch that my business is going on the rocks?
sentences.cn: 她是不是预感到我的生意要垮台?

sentences.en: Elliott had a hunch that this might be the night.
sentences.cn: 直觉告诉艾略特,不寻常的事就要发生了,就在今晚.

sentences.en: Ensure that you don't hunch over when you walk.
sentences.cn: 务必保证你走路时不要驼背.

sentences.en: I had a hunch that Susan and I would work well together.
sentences.cn: 我有预感和苏珊共事会很融洽。

sentences.en: I have a hunch that he didn't really want to go.
sentences.cn: 我有这么一种感觉,他并不真正想去.

sentences.en: I have a hunch that it will snow soon.
I have a hunch that something is going to happen.
sentences.cn: 不知道为什么,我总感到要出什么事似的.

sentences.en: Lyubomirsky therefore confirmed her hunch that timing is important.
sentences.cn: 其实变化本身也很重要.

sentences.en: Sometimes I have a hunch that they're all making fun of me.
sentences.cn: 有时候我觉得他们都在取笑我.

sentences.en: Stand straight, don't hunch your shoulders!
Such an uncertainty may prevent you from acting on your hunch.
sentences.cn: 这个不明确因素可能阻挠你凭直觉行动.

sentences.en: SYA, " I got a hunch that this was my movie. "
sentences.cn: 当我三年后拿到相同的剧本, 我有种预感,这就是我的电影.

sentences.en: The manager a hunch that something was to pay.
sentences.cn: 经理感到事情有些不妙.

sentences.en: You can make extra cash if you act on a hunch.
sentences.cn: 白羊座:努力工作会带来额外收入.

trans.tran_en: if you have a hunch that something is true or will happen, you feel that it is true or will happen
to raise your shoulders into a rounded shape because you are cold, anxious etc
